title: shrngAra shaktyAyudha
sahitya:
shrngAra shaktyAyudha dhara sharavaNasya dAsOham anisham dhana dAnya pradasya


caraNam   gangAmrta pUrita ghaTA bhiSEkasya gadya padyA dinuta kOmaLatara padasya angArakAdi navagraha 
vanditasya Adi madhyAntara hitApramEya varasya jagadamikAdi sakaladEvatA mOhita jananAdi khEda 
bhanjana caturata rasya nagarAja sutA nandIsha navanandAdi bhakta janAntah karANAnanda guruguhasya
